alert.note: Alert for Southern Nassau; Southern Queens (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued October 26 at 5:15AM EDT until October 26 at 11:00AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM EDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Up to one foot of inundation above ground level expected in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline. * WHERE...Southern Queens and Southern Nassau Counties. * WHEN...Between 8 AM EDT and 11 AM EDT this morning around the times of high tide. * IMPACTS...Brief minor flooding of the more vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline. Minor flooding is expected in the more vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline. Some roads and low lying properties including parking lots, parks, lawns, and homes and businesses with basements near the waterfront will experience minor flooding.
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.
